wikipedia_page.main: Malaika Firth (born 23 March 1994) is a Kenyan-born British model. Firth attracted attention when, in 2013, she was booked as the first black model in nearly 20 years to appear in a Prada advertising campaign.

response: * Daisy fragrance for Marc Jacobs starring Ondria Hardin, Malaika Firth, Antonia Wesseloh, and Sophia Ahrens (2013)
*Malaika Firth – Kenyan model from London. First black model to appear in a Prada campaign in 19 years.
